block-title.cname-description: Unique store profile and brand logo will deepen consumersâ€™ impression of you
block-title.sender-description: When printing the shipper, the system will automatically bring in the sender information
block-title.interface-description: Backstage display language and order time zone setting
block-title.domain-description: If you already have a custom domain and are the domain owner, please complete DNS pointing settings in the domain business background
block-title.store-status-description: Manage the operating status of the online store

store-info.store-name-is-required: Please fill in the store name
store-info.store-introduction-tip-2: The changes may not be displayed immediately due to the "search engine" cache issue
store-info.store-logo-tip-2: The logo size will be proportionally scaled according to the menu height setting. The default menu height is 60px.
store-info.store-logo-tip-4: For best resolution, the recommended image width is at least 250px
store-info.mobile-store-logo-tip: The logo size of the mobile version of the logo is 60 * 250px. Any length or width exceeding or smaller than the range will be proportionally scaled.
store-info.website-icon-tip-3: Icon on the Browser: Due to Search Engine cache issues, changes might not be displayed immediately.

interface.currency-tip: Currency displayed on the background management interface
interface.locale-tip: The language displayed on the background management interface

domain.domain-alert-1: If there is no custom domain, do not fill in any URL
domain.domain-alert-2: If you want to use an independent website, we provide the service of purchasing a domain, you are welcome to contact us
domain.domain-alert-4: Set record type: CNAME, please enter www in the host field, enter your meepshop store URL (such as abc.new.meepshop.com) in the value/address field, and then enter your purchase in the custom domain field above URL (such as www.abc.com.tw), it will take 24~48 hours to take effect after setting.

store-status.store-status-alert-1: When the store status is suspended, your store will not be able to browse and purchase goods
store-status.store-status-alert-2: This status will not restrict your back-end management of the store, and the bill for renting the system will still be billed on time every month.
